text: Petar Cucić (born 18 March 1935) is a Yugoslav wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman light heavyweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Yugoslav male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Yugoslavia Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Petar Cucić
